root.name: Super Mario Bros. Mushroom World
root.description: OverviewSuper Mario Bros. Mushroom World is a pinball machine made in June 1992. Players were tasked with getting as much points as possible and defeating the Koopa Kids to rescue Princess Peach.Links:Pinball Compendium : 1982 to PresentSuper Mario Bros. Mushroom World Flyerhttp://www.arcade-museum.com/game_detail.php?game_id=15483Rarity:"This game ranks 1 out 0f 100, 100 being most common and 1 being rarest" according to Arcade Museum.com.
